default.brand_info: India's favorite car brand, known for reliability and efficiency. Ensure your localized manufacturing unit delivered a flawless piece.

why_pdi_matters.title: Manufacturing Defects
why_pdi_matters.text: Even top brands can have production slips. Catch paint issues, panel gaps, and electrical faults before registration.

why_pdi_matters.title: Transit Damage
why_pdi_matters.text: Cars travel hundreds of kilometers on trailers. Scratches, dents, and underbody damage are common during transit.

why_pdi_matters.title: Dealer Negligence
why_pdi_matters.text: Dealers may swap parts or hide defects. A PDI ensures you get exactly what you paid for, brand new and specific.

common_issues.title: Paint Scratches
common_issues.text: Look for swirl marks and minor scratches often caused by improper washing at the dealership.

common_issues.title: Odometer Check
common_issues.text: Ensure the odometer reading is under 100km. Higher readings indicate the car was used as a demo or test drive unit.

common_issues.title: Electrical Systems
common_issues.text: Test all lights, AC, infotainment, and power windows. Electrical gremlins are better caught early.

faqs.question: Is PDI mandatory for new cars?
faqs.answer: While not legally mandatory, it is highly recommended to ensure you are receiving a defect-free vehicle.

faqs.question: Can I do PDI myself?
faqs.answer: Yes, but a professional PDI expert has the tools and experience to catch subtle issues that a layperson might miss.

faqs.question: What if defects are found?
faqs.answer: If defects are found, you can refuse delivery or ask the dealer to fix them before accepting the car.

Maruti Suzuki.brand_info: India's favorite car brand, known for reliability and efficiency. Ensure your localized manufacturing unit delivered a flawless piece.

why_pdi_matters.title: High Volume Production
why_pdi_matters.text: Due to massive production numbers, minor fit and finish issues can occasionally slip through quality control.

why_pdi_matters.title: Stockyard Storage
why_pdi_matters.text: Popular models like Swift and Baleno often sit in open stockyards, risking sun damage and rodent issues.

why_pdi_matters.title: Accessory Fitment
why_pdi_matters.text: Dealer-installed accessories like chrome kits and covers are often fitted hurriedly; check for loose installs.

common_issues.title: Panel Gaps
common_issues.text: Inconsistent panel gaps, especially around the bonnet and boot, can occur in mass-market models.

common_issues.title: Rattling Noises
common_issues.text: Check for loose plastic trims on the dashboard and doors which can cause rattling on rough roads.

common_issues.title: Paint Quality
common_issues.text: Inspect for thin paint layers or 'orange peel' effect, particularly on bumpers and door edges.

faqs.question: Does Maruti support PDI?
faqs.answer: Yes, Maruti dealers are generally cooperative. Insist on inspecting the car at the stockyard before registration.

faqs.question: What about Nexa cars?
faqs.answer: Nexa cars are premium, but the PDI process remains critical. Check for scratches on the glossy finish.

faqs.question: Is rust a common issue?
faqs.answer: Surface rust on underbody components can happen if stored in humid stockyards. Check exhaust pipes and suspension.

faqs.question: CNG Kit Check?
faqs.answer: For CNG models, strictly verify the cylinder hydro-test date and compliance plate installation.

Hyundai.brand_info: A tech-forward brand delivering feature-rich cars. Verify that all those smart features and premium finishes are in perfect working order.

why_pdi_matters.title: Complex Electronics
why_pdi_matters.text: Models like Creta and Tucson are loaded with tech. Thoroughly test features like BlueLink, ADAS, and sunroofs.

why_pdi_matters.title: Transit Scratches
why_pdi_matters.text: Glossy black pillars and chrome elements on Hyundai cars are prone to hairline scratches during transport.

why_pdi_matters.title: Imported Components
why_pdi_matters.text: CKD models need checks on localized assembly points to ensure factory-level precision.

common_issues.title: Sunroof Operation
common_issues.text: Test the panoramic sunroof for smooth operation. Listen for any grinding noises or uneven movement.

common_issues.title: Touchscreen Glitches
common_issues.text: Ensure the large infotainment screens are responsive and don't freeze, especially with Android Auto/CarPlay.

common_issues.title: Fuel Pump Noise
common_issues.text: Listen for any unusual humming from the rear seat area, which could indicate a fuel pump issue (rare but noted).

faqs.question: How to check BlueLink?
faqs.answer: Ask the dealer to activate BlueLink temporarily to test remote functions like engine start and AC control.

faqs.question: DCT Gearbox Check?
faqs.answer: For DCT models, check for any jerkiness at crawling speeds or delay in engagement.

faqs.question: Paint protection needed?
faqs.answer: Hyundai paint is generally good, but check for swirl marks on dark colors before delivery.

faqs.question: ADAS Calibration?
faqs.answer: Ensure no warning lights for ADAS sensors are active on the instrument cluster.

Tata Motors.brand_info: Known for 5-star safety and rugged build. Focus your PDI on fit-and-finish details and electronic system stability.

why_pdi_matters.title: Fit and Finish
why_pdi_matters.text: While built like tanks, Tata cars can have minor alignment issues with plastic trims and beadings.

why_pdi_matters.title: Software Updates
why_pdi_matters.text: Infotainment systems often have pending updates. Ensure the latest stable software version is installed.

why_pdi_matters.title: Electrical Gremlins
why_pdi_matters.text: Check all sensors and digital displays. Tata's modern tech stack needs a thorough function check.

common_issues.title: Infotainment Lag
common_issues.text: Check the touchscreen response. Early batches sometimes have laggy interfaces needing software flashes.

common_issues.title: Door Alignment
common_issues.text: Ensure all doors, including the tailgate, close smoothly without needing excessive force.

common_issues.title: Rubber Beading
common_issues.text: Inspect rubber seals around doors and windows. Loose or pinched beadings are a known minor issue.

faqs.question: Is rust protection needed?
faqs.answer: Tata cars have good heavy gauge metal, but underbody coating is recommended for coastal areas.

faqs.question: Check engine light?
faqs.answer: Ensure no warning lights stay on after the engine starts. False sensors alerts can happen.

faqs.question: AMT Gearbox Check?
faqs.answer: On AMT models, check for smooth shifting and verify 'Creep' function works on slopes.

faqs.question: Harman Audio Check?
faqs.answer: Test all speakers. Sometimes a loose wire checks off a speaker in the premium sound system.

Mahindra.brand_info: The SUV specialists. Their rugged machines are packed with tech. Verify both the mechanicals and the sophisticated electronics.

why_pdi_matters.title: Electronics & Sensors
why_pdi_matters.text: With Adrenox and 4WD systems, Mahindra SUVs have complex wiring. meticulous checks are vital.

why_pdi_matters.title: Rough Usage Risks
why_pdi_matters.text: SUVs are often tested rigorously. Ensure your unit wasn't used for rough test drives before allocation.

why_pdi_matters.title: Leakage Checks
why_pdi_matters.text: Check for sunroof or window leaks, a concern sometimes reported in initial batches of new launches.

common_issues.title: Screen Blanking
common_issues.text: The massive dual-screens in XUV700/Scorpio-N should be checked for random restarts or blanking check.

common_issues.title: Suspension Noise
common_issues.text: Listen for any squeaking or thudding sounds from the suspension on speed breakers.

common_issues.title: Door Handles
common_issues.text: On XUV700, check the flush door handles deploy and retract smoothly every time.

faqs.question: 4WD/AWD Check?
faqs.answer: Engage 4WD modes on a loose surface (if permitted) to ensure engagement lights turn on.

faqs.question: Sunroof Leakage?
faqs.answer: Pour some water (with permission) over the sunroof channels to ensure drains are clear.

faqs.question: Software Version?
faqs.answer: Mahindra releases frequent updates. Ask the service team to flash the latest OS before delivery.

faqs.question: Steering Alignment?
faqs.answer: Check for left/right pulling. Big SUVs are sensitive to alignment issues during transit.

Honda.brand_info: Symbol of engineering precision. PDI focuses on preserving that pristine condition and ensuring hybrid systems are go.

why_pdi_matters.title: Low Ground Clearance
why_pdi_matters.text: Sedans like City have low clearance. Check underbody bumpers for scrapes from loading/unloading.

why_pdi_matters.title: Hybrid Systems
why_pdi_matters.text: For e:HEV models, battery health and hybrid system indicators need specific verification.

why_pdi_matters.title: Paint Softness
why_pdi_matters.text: Honda paint can be soft. Check for swirl marks and hairline scratches from dealer washing.

common_issues.title: Underbody Scrapes
common_issues.text: Inspect the front bumper lip and underbody engine guard for scrapes from transport ramps.

common_issues.title: Fuel Pump Recall
common_issues.text: Verify if the VIN falls under any active fuel pump recall campaigns (rare for new, but good to check).

common_issues.title: CVT Rubberband
common_issues.text: Test drive to ensure the CVT is smooth and doesn't show excessive lag or unusual whining.

faqs.question: Hybrid Battery Check?
faqs.answer: Ensure the hybrid battery charge level indicators fluctuate normally during a short test drive.

faqs.question: Honda Connect?
faqs.answer: Register and activate Honda Connect at the showroom to ensure the TCU is functioning.

faqs.question: Tyre Noise?
faqs.answer: Some models come with harder compound tires. Check for excessive road noise.

faqs.question: AC Performance?
faqs.answer: Honda ACs are strong, but check the 'Max Cool' mode works efficiently.

Toyota.brand_info: Global leader in durability. Validate the hybrid systems and ensure the legendary build quality is intact upon arrival.

why_pdi_matters.title: Hybrid Tech
why_pdi_matters.text: Hyryder and Innova Hycross rely on complex hybrid powertrains. Verify battery and motor switching.

why_pdi_matters.title: Waiting Periods
why_pdi_matters.text: High demand means cars might be rushed. Ensure dealer accessories are fitted with care.

why_pdi_matters.title: Interior Plastics
why_pdi_matters.text: Check for scratches on hard plastics in the cabin, easily occurring during pre-delivery cleaning.

common_issues.title: Hybrid Battery
common_issues.text: Confirm the self-charging hybrid system switches between EV and Engine mode seamlessly.

common_issues.title: Panel Alignment
common_issues.text: Check the tailgate and bonnet alignment. Heavy panels sometimes shift during transit.

common_issues.title: Accessory Fitment
common_issues.text: Chrome garnishes are popular. Ensure they are stuck properly and not peeling at edges.

faqs.question: Battery Warranty?
faqs.answer: Verify the separate warranty card/document for the Hybrid high-voltage battery.

faqs.question: DPF Issues?
faqs.answer: For diesel Fortuners, ask about DPF regeneration procedures and check for warnings.

faqs.question: Odometer Tampering?
faqs.answer: Toyota odometers are digital, but double-check the mileage is realistic (<50-100km).

faqs.question: Sunroof Check?
faqs.answer: On Hyryder, check the thin sunroof shade cloth for any tears or sagging.

Kia.brand_info: Stylish designs with premium interiors. Your PDI should focus on protecting those glossy finishes and verifying tech features.

why_pdi_matters.title: Glossy Trim Care
why_pdi_matters.text: Piano black interiors look great but scratch easily. Inspect these surfaces closely under torchlight.

why_pdi_matters.title: Connected Tech
why_pdi_matters.text: Kia Connect involves an embedded SIM. Ensure signal strength and remote commands work.

why_pdi_matters.title: Transmission Logic
why_pdi_matters.text: iMT and DCT gearboxes are complex. A test drive during PDI is essential to check smoothness.

common_issues.title: Headlight Condensation
common_issues.text: Check LED headlamps for internal moisture or fogging, a sign of poor sealing.

common_issues.title: Piano Black Scratches
common_issues.text: Inspect the center console and door pads. Micro-scratches are common on new units.

common_issues.title: DCT Heating
common_issues.text: If testing a DCT, check for any 'Transmission Overheat' warnings in heavy traffic/idling.

faqs.question: Kia Connect Activation?
faqs.answer: Ensure the dealer completes the KYC and activates the SIM before you drive out.

faqs.question: iMT Rollback?
faqs.answer: On iMT cars, check hill-start assist functionality to prevent rollback on slopes.

faqs.question: GT Line Wheels?
faqs.answer: Check alloy wheels for curb rash. Low profile tyres offer less rim protection.

faqs.question: Sunroof Action?
faqs.answer: Kia sunroofs are fast. Ensure they open/close fully without shuddering.

MG Motor.brand_info: Tech-heavy British heritage brand. The PDI is crucial for the massive infotainment screens and AI assistant features.

why_pdi_matters.title: Internet Inside
why_pdi_matters.text: The i-SMART system is the car's brain. Verify voice commands and Hello MG responsiveness.

why_pdi_matters.title: Fit/Finish checks
why_pdi_matters.text: Heavily accessorized models need checks for loose exterior chrome or badge alignment.

why_pdi_matters.title: Battery Discharge
why_pdi_matters.text: With so much tech, battery drain in stockyards is possible. Check battery health voltage.

common_issues.title: Voice Commands
common_issues.text: Test 'Hello MG' for sunroof and window operations. Lag or no response needs fixing.

common_issues.title: Internet Connectivity
common_issues.text: Ensure the car is receiving 4G signal. Apps like Gaana/MapMyIndia should load.

common_issues.title: Screen Bleeding
common_issues.text: Check the large tablet screens for light bleeding at edges or dead pixels.

faqs.question: EV Battery Check?
faqs.answer: For ZS/Comet EV, check State of Health (SOH) and ensure 100% charge cap.

faqs.question: Internet Pack?
faqs.answer: Confirm the validity of the free internet data pack with the dealer.

faqs.question: ADAS Functions?
faqs.answer: On Astor/Gloster, ensure the radar/camera sensors on the windshield are clean and calibrated.

faqs.question: Key Fob Range?
faqs.answer: Test remote start and window down features from a distance.

Volkswagen.brand_info: German engineering at its accessible best. Verify the solid build quality and ensure the sophisticated drivetrains are faultless.

why_pdi_matters.title: DSG Box
why_pdi_matters.text: The DSG gearbox is a gem but needs verification. Listen for clunks during shifts.

why_pdi_matters.title: Door Thud
why_pdi_matters.text: That reassuring thud relies on perfect alignment. Check door hinges and latches.

why_pdi_matters.title: EPC Errors
why_pdi_matters.text: Electronic Power Control errors can appear if the car was sitting with low battery. Check dash lights.

common_issues.title: AC Performance
common_issues.text: European ACs can struggle in extreme heat. Check cooling efficiency immediately.

common_issues.title: Power Windows
common_issues.text: One-touch up/down is standard. Ensure anti-pinch functionality works correctly.

common_issues.title: Roof Liner
common_issues.text: Check for sagging roof liners or stains, especially near the sunroof edges.

faqs.question: DSG Jerks?
faqs.answer: Slight creep is normal, but violent jerks are not. Test thoroughly in D and S modes.

faqs.question: Fuel Type?
faqs.answer: Confirm min RON rating. TSI engines are sensitive to poor quality fuel.

faqs.question: Service Package?
faqs.answer: Verify if the SVP (Service Value Package) is activated in the system.

faqs.question: Tyre Brand?
faqs.answer: Check which tyres are fitted. Batches vary between Ceat, MRF, or Goodyear.

Skoda.brand_info: Simply Clever engineering. Ensure all the smart little features and the robust German build quality are present and perfect.

why_pdi_matters.title: Simply Clever Features
why_pdi_matters.text: Check for the umbrella, ticket holder, and other smart accessories usually prone to theft.

why_pdi_matters.title: Paint Finish
why_pdi_matters.text: Skoda paint is premium. Scrutinize for any damage during transit or yard storage.

why_pdi_matters.title: Electronic Check
why_pdi_matters.text: Touchscreen and digital cockpit should be bug-free. Software stability is key.

common_issues.title: AC Vents
common_issues.text: Direct air flow sliders are delicate. Move them gently to ensure they aren't stuck.

common_issues.title: Door Rattles
common_issues.text: Check door pads for squeaks. Felt lining is used, but fitment can vary.

common_issues.title: EPC Warning
common_issues.text: Like VW, watch out for EPC lights which might indicate fuel or sensor issues.

faqs.question: Accessories check?
faqs.answer: Ensure the cushions and throw pillows (if part of pack) are in the boot.

faqs.question: Coding Tweaks?
faqs.answer: Ask usually dealer if features like acoustic lock confirmation can be enabled.

faqs.question: Warranty Activation?
faqs.answer: Double check the 4-year service & warranty package activation date.

faqs.question: Coating Recommendation?
faqs.answer: Skoda paint is hard, but ceramic coating is recommended to preserve the luster.

Mercedes.brand_info: The default luxury choice. Your PDI ensures the 'Best or Nothing' promise is kept, checking intricate luxury features.

why_pdi_matters.title: Complex Electronics
why_pdi_matters.text: MBUX, ambient lighting, and massage seats. The sheer number of electronics demands a long PDI.

why_pdi_matters.title: Import Damages
why_pdi_matters.text: CBUs travel far. Inspect closely for salt water corrosion or transit mishaps.

why_pdi_matters.title: Tyre Conditions
why_pdi_matters.text: Run-flat tyres are expensive. Inspect sidewalls for any cuts or bulges.

common_issues.title: Ambient Lighting
common_issues.text: Check all 64 colors cycle correctly and there are no dark spots in the strips.

common_issues.title: Chrome Brightwork
common_issues.text: Window surrounds and grille chrome should be spotless, without water scale marks.

common_issues.title: Seat Leather
common_issues.text: Inspect Nappa leather for any dye transfer or wrinkles from plastic covers.

faqs.question: MBUX Setup?
faqs.answer: Have the product expert set up your profile and Mercedes Me app during PDI.

faqs.question: Tyre Insurance?
faqs.answer: Highly recommended for RFTs. Check if it's included in the policy.

faqs.question: Paint Protection?
faqs.answer: Dealer detailing is often basic. Inspect thoroughly before accepting.

faqs.question: Spare Wheel?
faqs.answer: Usually a space saver. Check its pressure and tool kit placement.

BMW.brand_info: Sheer Driving Pleasure. Verify the driving dynamics, iDrive systems, and that aggressive sporty stance is flaw-free.

why_pdi_matters.title: iDrive Check
why_pdi_matters.text: The iDrive controller and gesture control need verification for calibration and response.

why_pdi_matters.title: Run-Flat Tyres
why_pdi_matters.text: Critical check for any sidewall damage on the low-profile RFTs fitted as standard.

why_pdi_matters.title: Sport Seats
why_pdi_matters.text: Check electric bolster adjustments on sport seats work and hold pressure.

common_issues.title: Gesture Control
common_issues.text: Test if the overhead sensors pick up volume and track change gestures accurately.

common_issues.title: Sunroof Rattle
common_issues.text: Panoramic sunroofs can sometimes creak. Open/close to check for silence.

common_issues.title: Wheel Alignment
common_issues.text: BMWs are sensitive. If the steering is off-center even slightly, ask for alignment.

faqs.question: BSI Plus?
faqs.answer: Verify the Service Inclusive package coverage and duration in the iDrive.

faqs.question: Apple CarPlay?
faqs.answer: Wireless CarPlay connection stability should be tested with your phone.

faqs.question: Break-in period?
faqs.answer: Ask about the running-in instructions, usually 2000km under 4500rpm.

faqs.question: Digital Key?
faqs.answer: If equipped, set up the Digital Key on your smartphone and test unlocking.

Land Rover.brand_info: The epitome of luxury off-roading. Your Land Rover PDI should focus on the sophisticated air suspension and heavy electronics.

why_pdi_matters.title: Air Suspension
why_pdi_matters.text: The complex air suspension system needs verifyication. Check for leaks or sagging after the car has been parked.

why_pdi_matters.title: Pivi Pro System
why_pdi_matters.text: The infotainment is central to the car's function. Ensure it boots up correctly and connects to networks.

why_pdi_matters.title: Leather Quality
why_pdi_matters.text: Windsor or semi-aniline leather is expensive. Inspect for any scratches or discoloration from transport.

common_issues.title: Software Glitches
common_issues.text: Screen freezing or rebooting is a known quirk. Ensure the latest software patch is installed.

common_issues.title: Panel Alignment
common_issues.text: Check the alignment of the tailgate and bonnet, common areas for slight deviations.

common_issues.title: Camera Calibration
common_issues.text: The 360-degree cameras must be perfectly stitched. Check for 'ghosting' in the image feed.

faqs.question: InControl Account?
faqs.answer: Ensure the dealer sets up your InControl Remote account for app connectivity.

faqs.question: Spare Wheel?
faqs.answer: Verify if you have a full-size spare (often an option) or a repair kit.

faqs.question: Run-in period?
faqs.answer: Land Rover recommends gentle driving for the first 3,000 km.

faqs.question: Deployable Side Steps?
faqs.answer: If fitted, cycle them multiple times to ensure they extend and retract fully.

Ford.brand_info: Built Ford Tough. While rugged, checking the American build quality and ensuring accessories are up to mark is vital.

why_pdi_matters.title: Gearbox shift
why_pdi_matters.text: The 10-speed auto on Endeavour or Mustang needs to be smooth. Watch for hunting between gears.

why_pdi_matters.title: Sunroof leaks
why_pdi_matters.text: Drainage channels on older stock can get clogged. Pour water to test flow.

why_pdi_matters.title: Sync System
why_pdi_matters.text: Ford's Sync 3 is great but check for touch responsiveness and voice command calibration.

common_issues.title: Battery Health
common_issues.text: Fords are power hungry. Stockyard cars often have weak batteries causing random errors.

common_issues.title: Rattles
common_issues.text: Check the dashboard and tailgate for any loose plastics or rattles on test run.

common_issues.title: Paint Swirls
common_issues.text: Dark colors like Absolute Black are prone to washing swirls. Inspect under direct sun.

faqs.question: Ford Pass?
faqs.answer: Activate the modem at delivery to use remote start and lock/unlock features.

faqs.question: AdBlue capability?
faqs.answer: For diesel BS6 models, check the AdBlue tank level is full.

faqs.question: Tyre Pressure?
faqs.answer: Ford specifies high pressures for Eco/Haul mode. Ensure it's set to 'Comfort' for delivery.

faqs.question: Warranty Start?
faqs.answer: Confirm the warranty starts from the invoice date, not the dispatch date.

Citroen.brand_info: French avant-garde design. Focus on the unique suspension comfort and the quirky interior ergonomics.

why_pdi_matters.title: Suspension Comfort
why_pdi_matters.text: The 'Flying Carpet' ride effect relies on perfect shock absorbers. Listen for knocks.

why_pdi_matters.title: Interior Quirks
why_pdi_matters.text: Citroens have unique switchgear. Verify all buttons and toggles feel solid and work.

why_pdi_matters.title: Paint Customization
why_pdi_matters.text: With many dual-tone options, check the masking line between the roof and body colors.

common_issues.title: Touchscreen Lag
common_issues.text: The infotainment can be basic. Check for lag when switching between CarPlay and radio.

common_issues.title: AC Performance
common_issues.text: Ensure the AC cools effectively, especially in the C3 which has manual controls.

common_issues.title: Brake Noise
common_issues.text: Check for any squealing from the front brakes during the short PDI drive.

faqs.question: MyCitroen Connect?
faqs.answer: Verify the dongle is fitted and the app is pairing with the vehicle.

faqs.question: Service Pack?
faqs.answer: Citroen offers various service packs. Confirm which one is applied to your VIN.

faqs.question: Tyre Brand?
faqs.answer: Check if the car comes with the promised tyre brand (often Ceat or MRF).

faqs.question: Accessories?
faqs.answer: Citroen sells many custom packs. Tally every item with the 'Vibe' pack list.
